Html:
At the moment the only callback available when sending a DialogMessage is Action<MessageBoxResult>. This is a bit limited, it would be great if we could use Action<object> also. I know that this is easily implemented with a custom message class, but it would still be nice if it was available out of the box.

/Henrik

Hi,

This is a very good point and I entered it in the backlog. In the mean time, you can use the new NotificationMessageAction<T> message type (available in V3/alpha) to send messages with a generic callback. 

Thanks,

Laurent
I had totally missed NotificationMessageAction. Will try it after the holidays. Thanks!
